title: Emily Ratajkowski on outing with Sebastian Bear-McClard after deleting pictures of him on Instagram
text:
Emily Ratajkowski seems to have deleted at least two Instagram pictures of her and her husband Sebastian Bear-McClard on Sunday.

However there doesn't seem to be any trouble in paradise between the couple as they were seen on an outing together in New York City on Sunday.

The model, 28, had removed the posts after they had amassed over 100,000 combined likes.

In the first photo, Bear-McClard, 32, can be seen standing behind Ratajkowski with one hand wrapped around her waist.

Deleted! Emily Ratajkowski, 28, seems to have deleted an Instagram picture of her and her husband Sebastian Bear-McClard, 32, on Sunday

Pink polo: However there doesn't seem to be any trouble in paradise between the couple as they were seen on an outing together in New York City on Sunday

The Good Time actor dons black pants with a pink sweater and a blue and purple patterned button-up underneath.

He accessorizes with a gold watch and black shades, finishing the look with a pair of black and red trainers.

Ratajkowski wears tan pants with a tan blazer and a white one-shoulder crop top.

Monochrome: Ratajkowski wears tan pants with a tan blazer and a white one-shoulder crop top

Black and gold: The London-born actress accessorizes with gold jewelry and black shades

Strike a pose: A small black purse can be seen peeking out from under her shoulder while she dons white trainers on her feet

Bling! Sebastian accessorizes with a gold watch and black shades, finishing the look with a pair of black and red trainers

The London-born actress accessorizes with gold jewelry and black shades while her sleek brunette tresses are worn down straight.

A small black purse can be seen peeking out from under her shoulder while she dons white trainers on her feet.

The couple was later seen walking their dog, Colombo, together in New York City.

Adios! Ratajkowski also deleted a picture of her, her husband and her pooch Colombo that she had posted earlier in October

Ratajkowski also deleted a picture of her, her husband and her pooch Colombo that she had posted earlier in October.

The model and Bear-McClard got married on February 23 last year in a New York City courthouse.

The last public event they attended together was the Toronto International Film Festival on September 9, which is also the most recent photo Ratajkowski left posted on her Instagram page.
description: The model, 28, had removed two Instagram posts after they had amassed over 100,000 combined likes.
